add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for GET /api/v1/cart to retrieve cart contents, individual subtotals, and cart total. LLD describes repository/service logic but does not specify API contract or response structure.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria requires a RESTful endpoint for cart retrieval, including subtotal and total, which is not reflected in LLD API specification.

add.description: Missing UI redirection logic for empty cart state ('continue shopping' link). LLD covers backend logic but omits frontend workflow for empty cart scenario.
add.reason: Story specifies UI behavior for empty cart, but LLD does not address this requirement.

add.description: Missing explicit API contract for PUT /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to update quantity. LLD describes repository/service update logic but does not specify API endpoint or contract.
add.reason: Story requires RESTful endpoint for updating cart item quantity, which is not reflected in LLD API specification.

add.description: Missing explicit API contract for DELETE /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to remove item from cart. LLD describes repository/service remove logic but does not specify API endpoint or contract.
add.reason: Story requires RESTful endpoint for removing cart item, which is not reflected in LLD API specification.

modify.current_state: CartService.addItem validates product availability and adds item to cart, but does not enforce default quantity of 1 when quantity is not specified.
modify.required_change: Update CartService.addItem to default quantity to 1 if not provided, matching story acceptance criteria.
modify.reason: Story specifies default quantity of 1 for 'Add to Cart' action, but LLD does not enforce this.

modify.current_state: CartService.calculateTotals applies pricing, tax, shipping, and discount, but does not explicitly recalculate subtotal and total upon any quantity mutation.
modify.required_change: Ensure subtotal and total are recalculated immediately after any cart item quantity update.
modify.reason: Story requires automatic recalculation of subtotal and total upon quantity mutation, but LLD does not guarantee this behavior.
